mapper.select: SELECT SWA.WISH_NUMBER, U.USER_NAME, SWA.APPLY_STATUS, SWA.WISH_TITLE, SWA.WISH_MONEY FROM USER U JOIN ( SELECT WA.WISH_NUMBER, WA.USER_ID, WA.APPLY_STATUS, WA.WISH_TITLE, WA.WISH_MONEY FROM SELLER S JOIN ( SELECT W.WISH_NUMBER, W.USER_ID, A.APPLY_STATUS, W.WISH_TITLE, W.WISH_MONEY FROM WISH W JOIN APPLY_STATUS A ON W.WISH_NUMBER = A.WISH_NUMBER AND W.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND A.APPLY_STATUS = 0 LEFT JOIN APPLY_STATUS A2 ON W.WISH_NUMBER = A2.WISH_NUMBER AND A2.USER_ID = #{user_id} WHERE A2.WISH_NUMBER IS NULL) WA WHERE WA.WISH_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', S.SELLER_AREA, '%') AND S.USER_ID = #{user_id}) SWA ON U.USER_ID = SWA.USER_ID
